loading-pls-wait: Did you know that a single bolt of lightning contains enough energy to toast 100,000 slices of bread?

errors.syntax-fatal-formatting: Your request is malformed, meaning one of the values are missing. This error should not occur naturally using the website, please open a GitHub issue.
errors.invalid-token: Your token is invalid, as its not associated with a user account.
errors.bad-access: The access code provided is incorrect.
errors.confirmation-no-match: The passwords you entered did not match.
errors.username-taken: The username you chose is already taken. Please choose another.
errors.username-system: The username you chose is system reserved. Please choose another.
errors.invalid-username: The username you chose does not meet standard requirements.
errors.work-already-exists: That workspace resource already exists for this user.
errors.invalid-work-resource: That workspace resource does not meet standard requirements.
errors.already-member: You are already a member of that workspace!
errors.has-active-sessions: This exam has one or more active sessions, so its settings cannot be modified.
errors.has-any-sessions: This exam has one or more sessions, so its questions cannot be modified.
errors.syntax-fatal-orderdupe: One or more of the orders are duplicated. This error should not occur naturally using the website, please open a GitHub issue.

heading.landing-2: Organize students, teachers, admins, the whole circus.
heading.landing-3: Real-time exams, tests, quizzes, spelling bees, anything really.

paragraph.landing-1: This is the free and open-source alternative to traditional education tools.
paragraph.latest-changes: You can check out all the changes in our GitHub repo!
paragraph.login-1: The details for your account are often provided by your school or server provider.
paragraph.signup-1: The access code is usually provided by the administrator or service provider.
paragraph.dashboard-1: This is where you see all your classes and perform actions on them.
paragraph.join-1: All workspaces have their own password. It's possible that there isn't a password set.
paragraph.create-1: The access code is usually provided by the administrator or service provider.
paragraph.policies: By continuing, you accept our Privacy Policy.
